headline: KLA Corporation (KLAC) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of semiconductor manufacturing equipment maker KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) jumped 4.3% in the afternoon session after a broad rally in chipmaker stocks occurred as Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) announced a significant deal with OpenAI.

headline: Super Micro Stock Soars After AMD's Big AI Deal With OpenAI
summary: Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ:SMCI) shares climbed Monday as investor enthusiasm for artificial intelligence continued to drive market momentum. The surge follows a landmark deal announced by Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ:AMD), which rose sharply in premarket trading, to supply OpenAI with up to 6 gigawatts of AMD Instinct graphics processing unit (GPU) power for the AI company's next-generation infrastructure. headline: Super Micro (SMCI) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of server solutions provider Super Micro (NASDAQ:SMCI) jumped 4.6% in the morning session after investor optimism rippled through the AI hardware sector as key chip supplier Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) announced a multiyear partnership to supply artificial intelligence chips to OpenAI.

headline: Why the Nasdaq Composite Is Beating the Dow Today
summary: The Dow was down 200 points, or 0.4%, after opening higher.  The Nasdaq Composite was up 0.4%.  The top S&P 500 stocks were Advanced Micro Devices, Super Micro Computer, Micron Technology, and Palantir Technologies.

raw.headline: Why the Nasdaq Composite Is Beating the Dow Today

headline: A Look at Supermicro (SMCI) Valuation Following Latest AI Server Shipments and Industry Partnerships
summary: Super Micro Computer (SMCI) is in the spotlight after announcing volume shipments of its latest AI-optimized servers and showcasing new systems at major industry events. The buzz centers on their technology, which is built for increasingly demanding AI data centers. See our latest analysis for Super Micro Computer. After a rough patch earlier in the year, Super Micro Computer's share price has bounced back, rallying almost 10% after breaking above resistance levels that had kept it in check...
